summary: adds a set of katana called Hanakotoba to the game which includes a set of daisho, a tachi and an odachi, optional skeleton is available for proper placement of the blade.
descriptionHtml:
Hanakotoba Katana Sets by Yurica

The kimono is here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58333/?]Kisetsu Kimono for UNP by Yurica[/url]

[i]~*~ Description ~*~[/i]

Hello all ^_^

This mod adds a set of katana which includes a set of daisho (a set of katana with the shorter one as decoration, pls see screenshots), a tachi (one-handed without the shorter one as decoration) and an odachi (two-handed).

The weapons are same level as "Daedric" and can be crafted in the forge under "Daedric" category, they can also be improved in the grinding wheel as usual.

[i]~*~ Optional Skeleton ~*~[/i]

I found the original weapon position for katana is very strange... So I have modified [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS[/url] skeleton position placement, the position you see in the screenshot is the new position. I did not rotate the katana upside down (like how it should be) for compatibility issue, but overall it is better than original placement.

The skeleton is available for download as optional file, please follow the instruction of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS[/url] installation and then replace it with the optional skeleton of this mod (remember to backup your old one first!!), I suggest to use a custom race with it.

oh, and the skeleton is for female character only :P

[i]~*~ Installations ~*~[/i]

1 - Extract the files to a location.
2 - Place the extracted "meshes" and "textures" folders into your skyrim/data.
3 - Place the yurica_daisho.esp file into skyrim/data.
4 - Activate the .esp.
5-  Install the optional modifided XPMS skeleton if you want the weapon placement as in the screenshots.
6 - Enjoy and please don't forget to endorse if you like the mod, thank you & please come visit me on yurica-skyrim @ tumblr ^_^

[i]~*~ Others ~*~[/i]

Please kindly contact me if you have any questions or needs permission, thank you very much!

[i]~*~ Credits ~*~[/i]

Thanks Mr. xp32 for XPMS :D
